articles.author: RAFIQ MAQBOOL, RAJANISH KAKADE
articles.title: The son of Asia’s richest man gets married in the year’s most extravagant wedding; - The Associated Press
articles.description: The youngest son of Mukesh Ambani, Asia’s richest man, has married his longtime girlfriend in what many have dubbed the wedding of the year. It's being attended by global celebrities, business tycoons and politicians, highlighting the billionaire’s staggering…
articles.content: MUMBAI, India (AP) The youngest son of Mukesh Ambani, Asias richest man, married his longtime girlfriend early Saturday in what many dubbed the wedding of the year, attended by global celebrities, bu… [+6504 chars]
